hey, yo, i'm sorry for what i said to ya, ya know, i didn't think before i
said those words, i should have been more careful with my words, because the
words i used didn't have shock absorbers......so Iron Raptor, i'm
sorry.......oh, yeah, can you tell me a bit about your characters
history?......you know the history of mine because you've been around
longer, but i don't really know your characters......we could privately
e-mail each other about some future plans we intend to do with the
characters...... apology accepted?....  : /
----- Original Message -----
From: "Carnage Dinobot" <carnage@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 8:02 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars Saga


>
>
> * Dinobot had seen the nervous look on Tavatron's face when he had
gestured towards the Ark's doors, simply meaning that he would rather hunt
his meal then watch it come out of a dispenser.
> But the look on her face almost seemed to look like there was a tale
behind it, something about her past that , perhaps, she didn't want him to
know...ever.
> He looked back towards the doors them began to move towards them, the
growling in his stomach had gotten louder and soon the hunger pains would
start, if they did then it would be difficult for him to chase after his
prey...if the growls from his stomach did not scare it away first.
> Dinobot had seen Tavatron recover from her nervousness and regain her,
seemingly impenetrable, posture but he knew that something was up. Perhaps
he would find out on his own from little snatches of information that escape
her awareness or even have to pry it out of her, but at the moment their
stomach were the important things.
> He came to the doors and looked at them, as the light reflected off of the
smooth steel he noted distinct figure prints on it, they looked familiar but
not so familiar that he could recognize them right off. He pondered about
who they might belong to but then decided to think about it later, he pushed
open the doors and stood aside for Tavatron to exit first...seeming to
become a habit.
> Dinobot looked at Tavatron but keeping watch not to make eye contact with
her, she had found out TOO much the last time she had looked into his eyes
and it had made him uncomfortably was curios of what she found out when she
had last looked in him but decided to stick to the topic of hunting, he
needed to know where was the best place to hunt. Perhaps Tavatron knew.*
>
> " Perhaps you are aware of a location where prey is abundant?"
>
